name: Bot Crisis
description:
Put your wits and acting skills to the ultimate test! In this 3D online game, players are transported to a variety of captivating stages. The goal? To identify which of the characters are real players and who's just pretending to be a bot!

Gameplay


  • Identify real players: Can you discern who's a real player and who's an expertly disguised bot?
  • Behave as a bot: To avoid detection, you must behave as a bot yourself. This means moving around randomly and avoiding doing anything that would make you stand out.
  • Expose the players: There are animals and other hazards that can expose the real players. For example, some innocently annoying animals will only approach real players.

Features


  • Multiple stages: The game features multiple stages, including a farm, a desert, a haunted forest, a snow level, and a battlefield.
  • Customization: You can customize your appearance, including your skin color and clothing.
  • Chat: You can chat with other players. Though it is up to you whether to help them or fool them :).
  • Leaderboard: Compete on the leaderboard to become the ultimate Bot Crisis champion!

Humor


The game is full of humor, with funny animals and other hazards that can expose the players. This makes the game both challenging and fun.
